definition: to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing

sentences.english: It was a confirmation that the Nazis are still there and still active.
sentences.chinese: 这证实了纳粹党仍然存在着，并活动着。

sentences.english: She told him people wanted to forget the Nazis.
sentences.chinese: 她对丈夫说，人们都想忘记纳粹党人。

sentences.english: His house in Berlin was ransacked by the Nazis.
sentences.chinese: 他在柏林的住宅曾遭纳粹党人洗劫。

sentences.english: As nazism took hold of Germany, however, he saw nazism for what it was.
sentences.chinese: 但当纳粹党在德国当政后，他看清了纳粹的真面目。

sentences.english: And that was one of the reasons for the success of the Nazis , of Hitler.
sentences.chinese: 那还是纳粹党人取得成功的一个原因。

sentences.english: What, he wanted to know, was a good Nazi?
sentences.chinese: 他渴望知晓，何谓优秀的纳粹党人？

sentences.english: What is the difference between a Nazi and adog?
sentences.chinese: 纳粹党人和狗的却别是什么？

sentences.english: And I said, OK, it's a Nazi, there's no doubt in my mind.
sentences.chinese: 然后我说，好吧，是纳粹党，我毫不怀疑。

sentences.english: By 1933, the Nazi party had risen to power in Germany.
sentences.chinese: 到1933年，法西斯纳粹党已经在德国上台执政。

sentences.english: Investigators found drawings of swastikas and graffiti at the scene.
sentences.chinese: 调查人员发现纳粹党万字符号和一些乱划的痕迹。

sentences.english: The neck of the bottle has a smaller label of an eagle on top of a swastika.
sentences.chinese: 瓶颈上有一个更小的标签，上面有带鹰的纳粹党徽。

pinyin: guo2 jia1 she4 hui4 zhu3 yi4

definition: Joseph Goebbels (1897-1945), German Nazi leader and politician
Benito Mussolini (1883-1945), Italian fascist dictator, "Il Duce", president 1922-1943

pinyin: min2 zu2 she4 hui4 zhu3 yi4

definition: Leon Davidovich Trotsky (1879-1940), early Bolshevik leader, exiled by Stalin in 1929 and murdered in 1940
